data.title: The Princeton Review Ranks Regent Among Top 50 Online MBA Programs
data.meta_description: Regent University’s School of Business & Leadership is celebrating its 4th consecutive ranking for The Princeton Review’s 2024 Top 50 Online MBA Programs.
data.text:
VIRGINIA BEACH, VA (July 18, 2024) – Regent University’s School of Business & Leadership is celebrating its fourth consecutive ranking on The Princeton Review’s 2024 Top 50 Online MBA Programs list—landing in the No. 34 spot among the nation’s best.

“This treasured acknowledgement by The Princeton Review is yet again a testament to our faculty’s unyielding commitment to educate and serve the next generation of business excellence,” said Doris Gomez, Dean of Regent University School of Business & Leadership. “Cultivating enterprising thought with principles rooted in servant leadership equips our graduates with the tools to succeed and lead a rapidly evolving business environment.”

The Princeton Review compiles its annual ranking of online MBA programs based on methodology that includes 60 weighted data points gathered from student surveys and institutional data. The evaluation process considers factors like admissions selectivity, faculty credentials/training/ratings, academic rigor, technological infrastructure, career preparation/outcomes, overall program satisfaction and more.

The Princeton Review’s website features in-depth profiles of the 50 online MBA programs that made the list.

To learn more about Regent University’s nationally ranked School of Business & Leadership, visit regent.edu/school-of-business-and-leadership/.

About Regent University

Founded in 1977, Regent University is America’s premier Christian university, with more than 13,000 students studying on its 70-acre campus in Virginia Beach, Virginia, and online around the world. The university offers associate, bachelor’s, master’s, and doctoral degrees in more than 150 areas of study, including business, communication and the arts, counseling, cybersecurity, divinity, education, government, law, leadership, nursing, healthcare, and psychology. Regent University has been ranked the #1 Best Accredited Online College in the United States (Study.com, 2020), the #1 Safest College Campus in Virginia (YourLocalSecurity, 2021), and the #1 Best Online Bachelor’s Program in Virginia for 12 years in a row (U.S. News & World Report, 2024).
